title: One step forward, two steps back? Senate outlook with Jake Sherman & Alayna Treene
description: Punchbowl News co-founder Jake Sherman and Axios Congressional reporter Alayna Treene join Chuck to talk about the shifting infrastructure talks, police reform and Sen. Joe Manchin’s ability to stay in the center of the news. Plus WRC NBC4 Investigative reporter Scott MacFarlane joins the show to discuss the long road ahead for convicting people who attacked the Capitol on January 6th.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
content:encoded: Punchbowl News co-founder Jake Sherman and Axios Congressional reporter Alayna Treene join Chuck to talk about the shifting infrastructure talks, police reform and Sen. Joe Manchin’s ability to stay in the center of the news. Plus WRC NBC4 Investigative reporter Scott MacFarlane joins the show to discuss the long road ahead for convicting people who attacked the Capitol on January 6th.
itunes:title: One step forward, two steps back? Senate outlook with Jake Sherman & Alayna Treene
itunes:author: NBC News
itunes:summary: Plus, Jan. 6th suspects will take months and years to process through the courts. Scott MacFarlane explains.
